tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I have been very happy as Doctor Explained me clearly about the issue, what are consequences of maintaining the current state, consequences if I take action now, when action is needed to get this issue, fixed, how to get this issue fixed, the action plan what will be required to fix the issue.
It is not just checking and telling to do this or that, It is letting the patient know, what is the issue, what has caused this issue, how to avoid the issue. How to fix the issue. With clarity, about time, efforts and consequences.
I am happy with the service, clarity, and cleanliness at the clinic.
